JOB SCOPE The Property Manager is fully accountable for all day to day property operations, overseeing and enhancing the value of the property, directing and planning towards a successful and efficient management. SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES & ACCOUNTABILITIES Establishes rental rate by surveying local rental rates; calculating overhead costs, depreciation, taxes, and profit goals. Attracts tenants by advertising vacancies; obtaining referrals from current tenants; explaining advantages of location and services; showing units. Contracts with tenants by negotiating leases; collecting security deposit. Sets up the tenant policy. Accomplishes financial objectives by collecting rents; paying bills; forecasting requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective action. Maintains property by investigating and resolving tenant complaints; enforcing rules of occupancy; inspecting vacant units and completing repairs; planning renovations; Maintains building systems by contracting for maintenance services; supervising repairs. Secures property by contracting with security service; installing and maintaining security devices; establishing and enforcing precautionary policies and procedures; responding to emergencies. Prepares reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data and trends. Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations. Other duties as assigned by CEO.

Knowledge, Skills and Competency Requirements: Bachelor degree in related or graduate of an other related programme required. Working experience in the same position required or strong track record in Property Manager for at least 3 years. Detail oriented, consistent, tenacious & possess effective time management and organizational skills Strong ability to empathize Strong leadership, coaching and counselling skills. Strong analytical skills and strategic thinking. Basic financial management knowledge. Able to multi-task and prioritise tasks consistent with business objectives. Work requires willingness to work a flexible schedules. Proficient in English
